title: “Sliding doors” economics
itunes:title: “Sliding doors” economics
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: The economy has made a remarkable recovery since the depths of the COVID-19 pandemic, but where would we be without that downturn? On today’s show, we talk “what ifs” with economists. Plus: semiconductor demand, oversharing on LinkedIn and what to make of the September jobs report.
itunes:summary: The economy has made a remarkable recovery since the depths of the COVID-19 pandemic, but where would we be without that downturn? On today’s show, we talk “what ifs” with economists. Plus: semiconductor demand, oversharing on LinkedIn and what to make of the September jobs report.
